description: The Met said the arrest on suspicion of GBH of three teenage girls is under review after a man's death.
title: Seven Sisters: Three teenage girls under arrest after man's death
title_page: Seven Sisters: Three teenage girls under arrest after man's death - BBC News
maintext:
Police are reviewing any charges three teenage girls might face after a man died the day after being found injured in north London.
The girls, aged 14, 16, and 17, were arrested on suspicion of GBH on Thursday after a 75-year-old Bolivian national was taken to hospital.
Police and paramedics were called to Seven Sisters Road in Islington just before midnight.
The Metropolitan Police Force said formal identification and a post-mortem examination will be arranged in due course, but the man's family had been informed.
